front.title: MPLS On-demand Connectivity Verification and Route Tracing

abstract.t: LSP-Ping is an existing and widely deployed OAM mechanism for MPLS LSPs. This document describes extensions to LSP-Ping so that LSP- Ping can be used for On-demand Connectivity Verification of MPLS-TP LSPs. This document also clarifies procedures to be used for processing the related OAM packets. Further, it describes procedures for using LSP-Ping to perform Connectivity Verification and Route Tracing functions in MPLS-TP networks. Finally this document updates RFC 4379 by adding a new address type and requesting a registry.
